sandbox.title: Sandbox

formatting.content: The code is checked with ESLint, Prettier and TypeScript

errorBoundary.description: An unknown error occured. If the error persist, contact an administrator.

maintenanceMode.description: It will be available online as soon as possible

codepush.title: Update is required
codepush.description: An app update is mandatory to be able to use the application.
